post.body: haha! i dig his album. homie's pourin his heart out his way. i'll take hathaweezy over kanyeezy though.
i know, that's what's crazy. i was initially thinking of vocalists and came up nil. kanye? lmao.
he still rockin a ginger ponytail? LOL.
of course. i can't fuck with that anticon shit. never could. dear el-p and linda tripp. both were not ETHER or TAKEOVER.
i was trying to think of contemporary artists that match that kind of honesty. scarface is probably who i think of first.
way too excited to twit with the hammer man. what's good playboi?
it was definitely the struggle. they didn't have shit to lose, and poured their soul into it in ONE take.
big brother is my shit for life. dude's a living legend/genius. motown museum blew my mind.
i like it exactly where it's at man. now anyone can do this shit, which is a gift and a curse.
kane still does his thing live too. shit i'm in a time warp. next we're talking about the fat boys and stetasonic.
the first time i saw the trailer i thought it was corny, but knew i was gonna check. gravy got lucky on that one.
i think we're all gonna check it but i feel your sentiment. if it's tasteful then cool.
yeah that's one of my faves. zipped up my pants, she's on the floor with her mouth flooded! back to killin after nuttin lol.
i just dug his don't give a fuck swag more. gun and pussy talk all day.
tweet on brotha, tweet on. don't let deez twhaters get you down.
haha i feel ya on that. it is simple. you have twit beef already? lol. increase the peace.
if i get outta work early i'll pop through homie.
yeah, it sucks to see real artists not cakin like they should.
i know i'll cop tomorrow. scarface is grown man music.
I can feel that. My breakfast was less healthy than yours. I envision you marrying a white rasta nutritionist with your diet.
you may be buggin with that one. I recognize the creativity tho.
you talkin the one lb block? We can talk bout this for a min. Takin me back.
yeah fuck that. You have a good life going on. I feel like a proud uncle.
I didn't know it was a superhero trait. Now I'm learned. I promise I won't.
aight homie. Ill holla.
thought this ben & jerry's cake batter shit would be bangin. sorta lackluster. half baked still holds the block for ice cream and movie.
aight, good nite world... flight in 4 hours and i'm still up lol. ain't nothin changed.
still wondering what mc hammer's doing on twitter. i gotta add this beast.
i think it's cool that it's 08 and people are still talkin about rakim. i fuck with kool g rap a little more tho.
Its brick enough for a snuggie. Spicy chicken empanada act like ya know....
i used to be ugly now these bitches are medusa. lol. aight nore!
now i'm in the tunnel listening to cnn phonetime. gonna cop an 8ball jacket and some timbs.
damn, my afternoon is retro. listening to quiet storm remix. just copped serato so i'm diggin in my digital crates.
this can't be life is one of my favorite posse cuts. kanye got beats. ashamed i haven't copped the new scarface now.
will palestine and israel ever get it together? shitty.
it's a jigga afternoon. dude's got too many classics.
Benjamin button is a way to make pedophilia look cool. its never cool mr pitt. I'm watching you.
Okay so xmas music season is over! Why am I still hearing it? Let it go yo.
Breakfast is officially the best meal.
My livers in a recession. Chill homie.
